mutants.code:
def calculate_insertion_sort_shifts(arr):
    size = len(arr)
    count = 1
    for i in range(1, size):
        tmp = arr[i]
        j = i - 1
        while j >= 0 and arr[j] > tmp:
            arr[j + 1] = arr[j]
            j -= 1
            count += 1
        arr[j + 1] = tmp
    return count

    return count
